dmca.title: Penis Information Siteowner Asks Google to Remove Allegedly Infringing Site
dmca.body:
09/11/2002 WED 01:02 FAX GOOGLE INC                                  001/009
    
                                      [Private]
                    [Private], Scarborough WA 6019, Australia
                    Tel: [Private] mail: [Private]

    
             28/8/2002
    
             DMCA Complaints
             Google
             [private]
             Mountain View
             CA 94043, USA
    
             Dear Sir/Madam,
    
             Please find enclosed two documents being hard copies of 1) a site (www.alt-
             penis.com) infringing the copyright of our site and 2) whois information for this
             infringing website.
    
             I am the proprietor of the site www.altpenis.com making this complaint against the
             site www.alt-penis.com.
    
             The copyrighted work at issue is the whole of our site (www.altpenis.com).  The
             infringing site (www.alt-penis.com) appears to have taken our entire site and
             replicated it in its entirety with the addition of their own banner ad on each page (the
             banner ad clicks through to http://www.penisenlargementfacts.com/drwhitehead/ who
             appears to be the sole beneficiary of this blatant rip-off).
    
             The infringing site can be found using the search term "site:www.alt-penis.com'.
    
             I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the
             allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or
             the law.
    
             I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate
             and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
             Regards,
            
             [Private]

    Low Sex Drive Linked To Snoring
    Men who suffer from obstructive sleep apnea -
    the inability to breathe properly during sleep -
    produce lower levels of testosterone, resulting
    in decreased libido and sexual activity...

    who were exposed to a synthetic hormone
    withdrawn from use in the late 1970s...

    of cognitive decline and Alzheimer's disease...

    18 July 2002
    Smoking Damages Sperm DNA
    Scientists say that smoking alters the DNA of
    sperm and they believe this hampers the
    development of the fertilized embryo...

    production of T cells - vital for a healthy

    oestrogens from the environment, and also

    significantly affect the fertilising ability of

    Excerpts From Our Most Requested News Articles
    
    Natural Penis Enlargement & The Jelq
    Penis enlargement can supposedly be traced back to ancient times, when Arabic
    fathers would prepare their sons for marriage by using a technique called jelqing
    which increased the size of the penis. Some claim that jelqing exercises resulted in
    penis size increases of up to 18"! Penis size increases of this nature are dubious and
    whether this is where jelqing got its name is debatable but the term jelqing has
    come to be used for a range of natural penis enlargement exercises, Europeans are
    credited with the popularization of natural penis enlargement, with variations on the
    jelq technique...
    
    Diet & Exercise Can Inhibit Prostate Cancer
    A high-fat diet and sedentary lifestyle may predispose men to prostate cancer
    through effects on serum factors such as hormones. The Pritikin low-fat, high-fiber
    
    http://Www-alt-penis.com/
    
    003/009
    
    29/09/2002

    



    09/11/2002 WED 01:03 FAX GOOGLE INC                                  004/009
    
              diet and exercise program, on the other hand, may reduce the risk of clinical
              prostate cancer, says R. James Barnard, Ph.D.  Dr. Barnard, of the Department of
              Physiological Science and the UCLA Division of Clinical Nutrition, Department of
              Medicine, will present evidence that links a low-fat diet and exercise to reduced
              prostate cancer cell growth at the 2000 American Physiological Intersociety,
              Meeting...
    
              Pheromone Study identifies Powerful Sexual Attractant
              In the pheromone study, one subject reported she engaged in kissing and petting
              about one day a week before taking part in the experiment.  However, after wearing
              the pheromone, the number increased to nearly six times a week. The woman also
              reported she slept next to a romantic partner and engaged in sexual intercourse four
              nights a week while wearing the pheromone compared to less than one night a week
              when she did not wear the pheromone...
    
              Penis Enlargement Research Results Released
              Darren Beale, proprietor of Penis Health, says he was fed up with what he called
              "all the nonsense that passes for fact on penis enlargement websites." Last year,
              Beale set out to change that by commissioning a detailed study amongst fifty
              randomly selected members of a natural penis enlargement (jelqing) program.  Beale
              says that his penis enlargement program is the first to sponsor research into the
              effectiveness of its jelqing techniques. Subscribers were asked to complete two
              surveys - one prior to commencing the penis enlargement program - and one on
              completion of the penis enlargement program. Results from the survey make
              interesting reading as to what results men can really see from a penis enlargement
              program. Key findings include...
    
              Babies With Micro Penis Disorder Happier When Raised Male
              Genetically and physically male babies born with a condition called "micropenis"
              are more likely to achieve psychological and sexual well-being in adulthood if
              raised male, according to a new study by researchers at Johns Hopkins and three
              other centers. Their report in this month's Hormone Research is the first
              comprehensive, long-term study examining psychological and sexual outcomes for
              both men and women. People born with a micropenis and raised as girls said they
              identified solidly with their female gender, but only 20 percent of the women said
              they were satisfied with their genitalia- In contrast, 50 percent of men, some of
              whom had attained normal penis length with the help of testosterone replacement,
              said they were satisfied with their genitalia...
    
              Why Do You Want To Enlarge Your Penis?
              Many penis enlargement sites pronounce the average penis size as "small". You
              should not embark on a penis enlargement program simply because a website tells
              you that your penis is too small. Any penis that is more or less average size does not
              need to be enlarged to provide pleasure in either a straight or gay relationship. If
              your penis is of an average size then there is absolutely no reason to undertake a
              penis enlargement program...
    
              Penis Enlargement Pills For A Bigger Penis?
              Pills and capsules that claim to enlarge the penis are a hot topic at the moment.
              Going under names like Longitude, Vig RX, Enzyte and Extend, the manufacturers
              of these herbal penis enlargement preparations claim they can increase the size of
              the penis by up to 50%. The ingredients of these penis enlargement preparations
         

             http://www.alt-penis.com/                                   29/09/2002

    




    09/11/2002 WED 01:04 FAX GOOGLE INC                                  005/009
    
             vary, usually including a number of herbs and vitamins- The active ingredient in
             most of these preparations is Yohimbine. Yohimbine has been the subject of several
             studies with laboratory animals. In rats, Yohimbine was found to boost the sex
             drive, hence its reputation as being an aphrodisiac as well...
    
             Genital Size Obsession Affecting More Men
             Although women are usually more dissatisfied with their body appearance than
             men, a new study has found that men are as likely as women to seek help for the
             image obsession known as body dysmorphic disorder- Differences between the
             genders centered mainly on the body part that was of concern to the patient While
             men were often concerned with body build, hair loss and the size of genitals,
             women focused on weight and hips and the condition of their skin- These
             differences led to variations in the way the patients handled their perceived flaws---
    
             Viagra Builds Now Brain Celia
             Viagra, used for erectile dysfunction and one of the most frequently prescribed
             medications in the United States, has been found to reduce the effects of stroke in
             laboratory animals. "What we found is that we can use drugs like Viagra to create
             new brain cells," said M Chopp, Ph.D.. (sic) "And these cells are created in both elderly
             as well as young subjects. When animals with stroke are treated with Viagra, the
             drug provides very significant neurological functional benefit. These animals do
             much better on many different outcome, measures, including motor function,
             somatogensory testing, neurological outcome and weight gain, There are far fewer
             functional deficits. We can treat with Viagra days after stroke and there is a
             significant induction of new brain cells," said Chopp...
    
             Penis Research Offers Erection Hope
             Researchers a decade ago discovered that release of nitric oxide from nerve endings
             in the penis caused erection, but the temporary release of nitric oxide - a
             neurotransmitter that survives just a few seconds before breaking down - couldn't
             explain how erections are naturally sustained over time. "Once blood starts flowing
             into the penis, the source of nitric oxide in the blood vessels is continuously
             activated so that more nitric oxide is released, more tissue relaxes, more blood
             comes in and a sustained erection is achieved," researcher Burnett says. This series
             of events, Burnett says, begins when erotic thoughts or physical sensations produce
             nitric oxide release in nerve endings in the penis. Nitric oxide is a relaxant that
             allows blood vessels to open up or dilate, bringing increased blood flow and
             swelling of tissues...
    
             Americans Sex Mad
             A sex survey shows Americans to have huge sexual appetites - having sex more
             often and with more partners than any other nationality. The survey says that the
             majority of Americans lost their virginity at 16 years of age whilst the global
             average was 18. The people that keep their virginity the longest are the Chinese.
             where the average age for the first sexual experience was 22...
    
             Boys Reaching Puberty Earlier
             Researchers found that between their ninth and tenth birthdays, 4.3% of caucasian
             boys, 21% of black boys and 3.3% of Mexican/American boys showed pubic hair
             development. Like genital growth, pubic hair development results from the natural,
             genetically programmed boost in production of male hormones, but environmental
             factors may play a role.  The research suggests US boys may be beginning puberty
        
            http://www.alt-penis.com/                                  29/08/2002

    




    09/11/2002 WED 01:04 FAX GOOGLE INC                                  006/009
    
              up to a half year earlier than previous research indicated. This is based on the onset
              of pubic hair growth, assessment of which is less subjective than that of testicular
              growth. The difference could be greater if the genital findings are accurate...
    
              Exposure To DDT, PCBs May Affect Body Size At Puberty
              A study by the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences reveals that a
              mother's background exposure to DDE (a product of the insecticide DDT) and
              PCBs (a banned liquid electrical insulator) may increase the size of her children at
              puberty. The study followed up the teen children of women whose blood and milk
              levels of PCBs and DDE samples had been measured by NIEHS in a North
              Carolina study of expectant and new mothers between 1978 and 1982. Height of
              boys at puberty, and their weight adjusted for height increased with higher prenatal
              exposure to DDE. Girls with the highest prenatal PCB exposures were heavier for
              their heights than other girls, but this result was statistically significant only in
              white girls...
    
              Adolescent Sexual Behavior Linked To Self Esteem
              Self-esteem plays an apparent role in the loss of virginity among adolescents,
              according to a study by researchers at the Indiana University School of Medicine.
              Self-esteem had opposite effects on young girls and young boys. Young girls with
              high self-esteem were less likely to engage in early sexual activity, while young
              boys with high self-esteem were more likely to report being sexually active. Results
              indicated that boys with high self-esteem were 2.4 times more likely to initiate
              intercourse than their peers with low self-esteem. High self-esteem had the opposite
              influence on girls, who reportedly were three times more likely to remain virgins
              than girls with low self-esteem...
